com.bwoestman.weatheralarm

Class AlarmController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bwoestman.weatheralarm.AlarmController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppInfo

    public class AlarmController
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppInfo
    this class acts as the controller for all alarm activities including: setting intents, validating alarm times and calculating adjustments and precipitation

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.bwoestman.weatheralarm.AppInfo

      void adjustAlarmCalendar(Alarm alarm) 
      void createAlarm(android.app.Activity activity, Alarm alarm)
      this method is used to set an AlarmClock to the time specified by the Alarm parameter
      void createAlarmCalendar(Alarm alarm)
      this method saves a calendar to the Alarm parameter for the specified alarm time
      void createTimedTask(android.content.Context context, Alarm alarm)
      this method creates a timed task that will wake the application to set the alarms at a future time
      boolean exceedsPrecipThreshold(Alarm alarm)
      this method determines if the current chance of rain exceeds the Alarm property for chance of rain
      boolean setAlarm(Alarm alarm)
      this method checks the alarm time and the adjustment to determine if the alarm should be set immediately
      boolean validateAlarmAdj(Alarm alarm)
      this method is used to check if the alarm adjustment will result in a valid alarm time by checking the difference between the alarm time and the minute value of the adjustment
      void validateAlarmTime(Alarm alarm)
      this function checks that the alarm is set for the future and adds 24 hours if the time has already expired
